I'll get a hotmail address and try that for a while. I will check at  
work on Tuesday and see what can be done. Now you, Ralph and Mark in  
Hawaii are all being blocked. Sorry for the private message on the  
list. And, looking forward to seeing everyone in SF. I'll be bringing  
some interesting koshirae again and fittings as well.

Gordon

On Jul 22, 2006, at 12:12 PM, Jim Gilbert wrote:

> Gordon,
> Your mail server is blocking my address now too, it's not just Ralph:
>
> SMTP error from remote mailer after RCPT TO:<robsongo@...>:
> host swumg1.swu.ac.jp [202.254.91.90]: 550 <jggilbert@...>:
> Sender address rejected: Blocked
>
> No more sword email to the work account I guess.
>

> yahoo or whatever until this is sorted out.
>
> Apologies to the rest of the list, but this is in regard to the  
> NTHK display at the SF show, so sword related.
>
> Thanks,
> Jim
